title: Ludwig serve doesn't work
body:
I tried this in Google Collab and on my Mac.

*Environment*
- Google Collab : Python 3.6.9
- Mac : Python 3.7.6
- pip install 'ludwig[serve]'  done, no errors

`sudo -H pip install 'ludwig[serve]'
